1.problem: Unclear large amount of various executable file analysis tools out there
1.solution: Holistic Reverse Engineering security expert platform for executable file formats

2.problem: Limited technical detailed access to the executable file's internals by the tools
2.solution: Customizable easy to use detail analysis

3.solution: Knowledge exchange between security experts and beginners

benefits.headline: Features and Benefits
benefits.1: 1 tool at 1 location for all analysis tasks
benefits.4: Hardening suggestions for minimization of vulnerability exploitation risks
benefits.5: Full access to the executable's internals via custom scripts
benefits.6: Comprehensible graphical visualizations of structural internals of the executables
benefits.7: Machine learning-based anomaly scoring for detection of malicious purposes
benefits.9: Rapid knowledge sharing and collaboration with experts community

vision.headline: Vision: Bringing Transparency into Cyber Security

statements.1: Unveiling the Veil: Empowering Cyber Security with Transparency
statements.2: Unify expertise on Malware characteristics and analysis approaches, fostering a community of ongoing experts to accelerate knowledge building
statements.4: Fast knowledge building through security expert community

3.gain: User-defined evaluation of arbitrary detail structures in executable files

4.gain: Hardening the executables to mitigate potential vulnerability exploitation

7.gain: Automatically scan and score downloads of executable files via Browser Plugin

impacts.headline: What we do
impacts.1: Central web platform and community for Executable File format analysis - All required tools are included
impacts.2: Full access to all internal technical structures via comfortable script languages (JavaScript, TypeScript)
impacts.3: Access to internal, possibly hidden information that makes statements about maliciousness
impacts.4: Experts exchange ideas and learn from each other
impacts.5: Anti-malware industry benefits from collected intelligence to detect even 0‑day threats
impacts.6: Leverage collected information for Deep Learning
impacts.7: Software industry uses information to harden its programs against exploits

features.8: More quota for API access by custom scripts

captcha.puzzle.text: What is the sum of {{num1}} and {{num2}}?

contact.introduction: Embark on a journey with us. Our contact form stands ready, anticipating your message. Whether you're a visionary collaborator or an aspiring customer, this is your chance to ignite the spark of possibility. Reach out today and let's explore the endless opportunities that await us. Together, we can achieve greatness. Start the conversation now!

stakeholders.headline: Stakeholders and Technology Stack
stakeholders.introduction: Discover the power of our cutting-edge static binary analysis platform, empowering experts across diverse domains with advanced backend modules for limitless possibilities:
stakeholders.lifecycle.headline: Software Development Lifecycle
stakeholders.lifecycle: Improve your software development experience! Seamlessly integrate the platform into your software development lifecycle, empower reverse engineering analysis, and continuous improvement to safeguard software users from an array of hazards in the digital realm.

introduction.1: Unleash the Power of Minds: Join the League of Codebreakers, Defenders, and Innovators! Our reliable team based in Northern and Southern Germany (Rostock, Cologne and Nuremberg).
introduction.2: is built by Security Experts, Software Engineers, Entrepreneurs and Scientists:

paxi.1: Original co-founder since the very first hour
paxi.2: Expert in back-end development and open-source projects
paxi.4: Bachelor of Science in Applied Computer Science

albi.1: Building the neuronal network for preemptive malware identification

diddy.4: Bachelor of Science in General Computer Science
